summary: A plugin to support you code with a wrapper transparently in a pluggable way.
name: shadow.vim
description:
Shadow.vim is a plugin to support you code with a wrapper transparently in a pluggable way.

* http://github.com/ujihisa/shadow.vim (development)
install_details: Unarchive the zip file into a directory that is under `&rtp` of your Vim, including `~/.vim` dir.
